channel.title: Adding more private respect search engine
channel.description: press on the search button for searching inside the forum, then go to options. you will find google search engine there. can we add startpage or duckduckgo instead of google ?

item.title: Adding more private respect search engine
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
yeah but discourse under heavy development , so i think they will work on that soon. in both cases we give them what they asked for and wait for it.

item.title: Adding more private respect search engine
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Just now submitted a feature request against discourse:

Discourse Meta

Feature request: configurable search engine for forum search

When pressing the search button, then options, it is currently limited to “Search with Google”. I haven’t found a setting to change that. It would be nice if that search engine could be set to something else. Reason: most of our community’s users...

Read full topic
